meanings.definition: A skin condition characterized by red pimples on the face and body.
meanings.sent1: Her acne made her feel self-conscious about her appearance.
meanings.sent2: I have been struggling with acne since my teenage years.
meanings.sent3: Even though acne can be annoying, it's a common issue many people face.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline was dotted with buildings like acne on a teenager's face.
meanings.sent5: The bright red acne stood out against her pale skin.

meanings.definition: To develop pimples on the skin.
meanings.sent1: If you keep touching your face, you might acne even more.
meanings.sent2: I always acne before important events, it's so frustrating.
meanings.sent3: I seem to acne at the worst possible times, like right before a date.
meanings.sent4: The stress from work seemed to make her acne uncontrollably.
meanings.sent5: She could feel her skin starting to acne, signaling the start of a breakout.
